meanings.definition: The quality or state of being neat, clean, and stylish in appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her spruceness always stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent2: The spruceness of his outfit impressed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent3: His spruceness was so impeccable that even the birds stopped to admire.
meanings.sent4: The spruceness of the garden was like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The spruceness of the room made it feel like a cozy haven.

meanings.definition: The act of making something neat, clean, and stylish in appearance.
meanings.sent1: She took great pride in the spruceness of her home.
meanings.sent2: His spruceness in arranging the flowers was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The spruceness of his painting job made the walls look brand new.
meanings.sent4: Her spruceness in organizing the event made it a huge success.
meanings.sent5: The spruceness of his grooming routine was evident in his polished appearance.
